statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT service_date, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT repair_details FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE repair_details LIKE '%brake%';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, repair_details FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, repair_details, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE repair_details LIKE '%engine%' ORDER BY vehicle_id;

SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, maintenance_cost FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost BETWEEN 300 AND 800 AND repair_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY maintenance_cost DESC, service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance_records WHERE service_date < '2022-06-01' OR maintenance_cost = 0 AND repair_details IS NULL ORDER BY service_date DESC, maintenance_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT repair_details, service_date FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE year < 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, cost FROM vehicle_maintenance WHERE repair_details LIKE '%engine%'
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle ORDER BY year ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT make, model, year, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicle GROUP BY make, model, year HAVING total_vehicles > 1
SELECT vehicle_make FROM (SELECT make AS vehicle_make, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicle GROUP BY make) AS vehicle_count ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, repair_details FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota'
SELECT mechanic_id, mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM Mechanics ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 500 ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_year < 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC
SELECT mechanic_name, mechanic_specialty FROM Mechanics WHERE mechanic_specialty = 'Engine' ORDER BY mechanic_name ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, service_date, repair_details, maintenance_cost FROM VehicleMaintenanceRecords WHERE service_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_mechanics FROM Mechanics
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT id, make, model FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_record WHERE cost < 500.00;
SELECT id, service_date, repair_detail FROM maintenance_record WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT mechanic.id, mechanic.name, mechanic.specialty, parts_used.part_name FROM mechanic JOIN parts_used ON mechanic.id = parts_used.id;
SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT v.make, v.model, m.name AS mechanic_name FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_record mr ON v.id = mr.vehicle_id JOIN mechanic m ON m.id = 1;

SELECT v.make, v.model, SUM(pu.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_record mr ON v.id = mr.vehicle_id JOIN parts_used pu ON mr.id = pu.maintenance_record_id GROUP BY v.make, v.model HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM mechanic WHERE specialty = 'Engine Tune-up' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT v.make, v.model, mr.service_date FROM vehicle v JOIN maintenance_record mr ON v.id = mr.vehicle_id WHERE mr.cost < 500.00 ORDER BY mr.service_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT brand, model FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM Vehicle ORDER BY brand ASC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT m.name, ma.specialization FROM Mechanic AS m JOIN MechanicAssignment AS ma ON m.id = ma.mechanic_id;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY brand DESC
SELECT brand, model FROM Vehicle WHERE brand LIKE 'Toyo%'
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecord WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT m.name, m.specialization, mr.service_date FROM Mechanic m JOIN MechanicAssignment ma ON m.id = ma.mechanic_id JOIN MaintenanceRecord mr ON ma.maintenance_record_id = mr.id
SELECT sh.service_type, sh.service_details, m.name FROM ServiceHistory sh JOIN MechanicAssignment ma ON sh.id = ma.maintenance_record_id JOIN Mechanic m ON ma.mechanic_id = m.id ORDER BY m.name
